EmailTemplate.description: Reminder Email to CTi Directors 15 days before every quater
EmailTemplate.name: BEN Reminder Email to CTi Directors
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder mail to enter test results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi CTi Category Directors,
Reminder to enter test results for your category for the last quarter. Kindly ignore this mail, if already undertaken.
This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply
Thanks, GPL Team
